   20: 
   21: %%
   22: 
   23: -module(odbc_data_type_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: %% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   26: -compile(export_all).
   27: 
   28: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   29: -include_lib("stdlib/include/ms_transform.hrl").
   30: -include("odbc_test.hrl").
   31: 
   32: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   33: %% all(Arg) -> [Doc] | [Case] | {skip, Comment}
   34: %% Arg - doc | suite
   35: %% Doc - string()
   36: %% Case - atom() 
   37: %%	Name of a test case function. 
   38: %% Comment - string()
   39: %% Description: Returns documentation/test cases in this test suite
   40: %%		or a skip tuple if the platform is not supported.  
   41: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   42: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   43: 
   44: all() -> 
   45:     case odbc_test_lib:odbc_check() of
   46: 	ok ->
   47: 	    [{group, char},{group, fixed_char}, {group, binary_char},
   48: 	     {group, fixed_binary_char}, {group, unicode},
   49: 	     {group, int}, {group, floats},
   50: 	     {group, dec_and_num}, timestamp];
   51: 	Other -> {skip, Other}
   52:     end.
   53: 
   54: groups() -> 
   55:     [{char, [],
   56:       [varchar_lower_limit,
   57:        varchar_upper_limit, varchar_no_padding,
   58:        text_lower_limit, text_upper_limit]},
   59:      {fixed_char, [],
   60:       [char_fixed_lower_limit, char_fixed_upper_limit,
   61:        char_fixed_padding]},
   62:      {binary_char, [],
   63:       [binary_varchar_lower_limit,
   64:        binary_varchar_upper_limit, binary_varchar_no_padding,
   65:        binary_text_lower_limit, binary_text_upper_limit]},
   66:      {fixed_binary_char, [], [binary_char_fixed_lower_limit,
   67: 			      binary_char_fixed_upper_limit,
   68: 			      binary_char_fixed_padding]},
   69:      {unicode, [], [utf8, nchar, nvarchar]},
   70:      {int, [],
   71:       [tiny_int_lower_limit, tiny_int_upper_limit,
   72:        small_int_lower_limit, small_int_upper_limit,
   73:        int_lower_limit, int_upper_limit, big_int_lower_limit,
   74:        big_int_upper_limit, bit_false, bit_true]},
   75:      {floats, [],
   76:       [float_lower_limit, float_upper_limit, float_zero,
   77:        real_zero]},
   78:      {dec_and_num, [],
   79:       [dec_long, dec_double, dec_bignum, num_long, num_double,
   80:        num_bignum]}].
   81: 
   82: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) when GroupName == fixed_char;
   83: 				       GroupName == fixed_binary_char ->
   84:     case ?RDBMS of
   85: 	mysql ->
   86: 	    {skip, "No supported by MYSQL"};
   87: 	_ ->
   88: 	    Config
   89:     end;
   90: 
   91: init_per_group(unicode, Config) ->
   92:     case {os:type(), erlang:system_info({wordsize, external})} of
   93: 	{{unix, _}, 4} ->
   94: 	    Config;
   95: 	{{unix, _}, _} ->
   96: 	    {skip, "Postgres drivers pre version psqlODBC 08.04.0200 have utf8-problems"};
   97: 	_ ->
   98: 	    Config
   99:     end;
  100: 
  101: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  102:     Config.
  103: 
  104: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  105:     Config.
  106: 
  107: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  108: %% Function: init_per_suite(Config) -> Config
  109: %% Config - [tuple()]
  110: %%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.
  111: %% Description: Initiation before the whole suite
  112: %%
  113: %% Note: This function is free to add any key/value pairs to the Config
  114: %% variable, but should NOT alter/remove any existing entries.
  115: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  116: init_per_suite(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  117:     case odbc_test_lib:skip() of
  118: 	true ->
  119: 	    {skip, "ODBC not supported"};
  120: 	false ->
  121: 	    case (catch odbc:start()) of
  122: 		ok ->
  123: 		    ct:timetrap(?default_timeout),
  124: 		    [{tableName, odbc_test_lib:unique_table_name()}| Config];
  125: 		_ ->
  126: 		    {skip, "ODBC not startable"}
  127: 	    end
  128:     end.
  129: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  130: %% Function: end_per_suite(Config) -> _
  131: %% Config - [tuple()]
  132: %%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.
  133: %% Description: Cleanup after the whole suite
  134: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  135: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  136:     application:stop(odbc),
  137:     ok.
  138: 
  139: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  140: %% Function: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) -> Config
  141: %% Case - atom()
  142: %%   Name of the test case that is about to be run.
  143: %% Config - [tuple()]
  144: %%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.
  145: %%
  146: %% Description: Initiation before each test case
  147: %%
  148: %% Note: This function is free to add any key/value pairs to the Config
  149: %% variable, but should NOT alter/remove any existing entries.
  150: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  151: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) when Case == varchar_upper_limit;
  152: 				     Case == binary_varchar_upper_limit;
  153: 				     Case == varchar_no_padding;
  154: 				     Case == binary_varchar_no_padding ->
  155:     case is_fixed_upper_limit(?RDBMS) of
  156: 	true ->
  157: 	    common_init_per_testcase(Case, Config);
  158: 	false ->
  159: 	    {skip, "Upper limit is not fixed in" ++ atom_to_list(?RDBMS)}
  160:     end;
  161: 
  162: init_per_testcase(text_upper_limit, _Config) ->
  163:     {skip, "Consumes too much resources"};
  164: 
  165: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) when Case == bit_true; Case == bit_false ->
  166:     case is_supported_bit(?RDBMS) of
  167: 	true ->
  168: 	    common_init_per_testcase(Case, Config);
  169: 	false ->
  170: 	    {skip, "Not supported by driver"}
  171:     end;
  172: 
  173: init_per_testcase(param_insert_tiny_int = Case, Config) ->
  174:     case is_supported_tinyint(?RDBMS) of
  175: 	true ->
  176: 	    common_init_per_testcase(Case, Config);
  177: 	false ->
  178: 	    {skip, "Not supported by driver"}
  179:     end;
  180: 
  181: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) when Case == nchar;
  182: 				     Case == nvarchar ->
  183:     case ?RDBMS of
  184: 	sqlserver ->
  185: 	    common_init_per_testcase(Case, Config);
  186: 	_ ->
  187: 	    {skip, "Not supported by driver"}
  188:     end;
  189: 
  190: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  191:     common_init_per_testcase(Case, Config).
  192: 
  193: common_init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  194:     PlatformOptions = odbc_test_lib:platform_options(),
  195:     {ok, Ref} = 
  196: 	case atom_to_list(Case) of
  197: 	    "binary" ++ _  ->
  198: 		odbc:connect(?RDBMS:connection_string(), 
  199: 			     [{binary_strings, on}] ++ PlatformOptions);
  200: 	    LCase when LCase == "utf8";
  201: 		       LCase == "nchar";
  202: 		       LCase == "nvarchar" ->
  203: 		odbc:connect(?RDBMS:connection_string(), 
  204: 			     [{binary_strings, on}] ++ PlatformOptions);
  205: 	    _ ->
  206: 		odbc:connect(?RDBMS:connection_string(), PlatformOptions)
  207: 	end,
  208:     odbc_test_lib:strict(Ref, ?RDBMS),
  209:     NewConfig = lists:keydelete(connection_ref, 1, Config),
  210:     [{connection_ref, Ref} | NewConfig].
  211: 
  212: is_fixed_upper_limit(mysql) ->
  213:     false;
  214: is_fixed_upper_limit(_) ->
  215:     true.
  216: is_supported_tinyint(sqlserver) ->
  217:     true;
  218: is_supported_tinyint(_) ->
  219:     false.
  220: is_supported_bit(sqlserver) ->
  221:     true;
  222: is_supported_bit(_) ->
  223:      false.
  224: 
  225: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  226: %% Function: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) -> _
  227: %% Case - atom()
  228: %%   Name of the test case that is about to be run.
  229: %% Config - [tuple()]
  230: %%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.
  231: %% Description: Cleanup after each test case
  232: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  233: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  234:     Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),
  235:     ok = odbc:disconnect(Ref),
  236:     %% Clean up if needed 
  237:     Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
  238:     {ok, NewRef} = odbc:connect(?RDBMS:connection_string(), odbc_test_lib:platform_options()),
  239:     odbc:sql_query(NewRef, "DROP TABLE " ++ Table), 
  240:     odbc:disconnect(NewRef).
  241: 
  242: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  243: %% Test cases starts here.
  244: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  245: 
  246: char_fixed_lower_limit() ->
  247:     [{doc,"Tests fixed length char data type lower boundaries."}].
  248: char_fixed_lower_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  249:     Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),   
  250:     Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
  251: 
  252:     %% Below limit
  253:     {error, _} = 
  254: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref, 
  255: 		       "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++    
  256: 			   ?RDBMS:create_fixed_char_table(
  257: 			  (?RDBMS:fixed_char_min() - 1))), 
  258:     %% Lower limit
  259:     {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
  260: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
  261: 			   ?RDBMS:create_fixed_char_table(
  262: 			      ?RDBMS:fixed_char_min())),
  263: 
  264:     %% Right length data
  265:     {updated, _} =  
  266: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++
  267: 			   "'" ++ string:chars($a, ?RDBMS:fixed_char_min())
  268: 		       ++ "')"),
  269:     %% Select data
  270:     {selected, Fields,[{"a"}]} =
  271: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table),
  272: 
  273:     ["FIELD"] = odbc_test_lib:to_upper(Fields),
  274: 
  275:     %% Too long data
  276:     {error, _}  =  
  277: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,"INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++
  278: 			   "'" ++ string:chars($a,
  279: 					       (?RDBMS:fixed_char_min()
  280: 						+ 1))
  281: 		       ++ "')").
  282: 
  283: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  284: 
  285: char_fixed_upper_limit() ->
  286:     [{doc,"Tests fixed length char data type upper boundaries."}].
  287: char_fixed_upper_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  288: 
  289:     case ?RDBMS of
  290: 	postgres ->
  291: 	    {skip, "Limit unknown"};
  292: 	_ ->
  293: 	    Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),   
  294: 	    Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
  295: 	    
  296: 	    %% Upper limit 
  297: 	    {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
  298: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
  299: 			       ?RDBMS:create_fixed_char_table(
  300: 				  ?RDBMS:fixed_char_max())), 
  301: 	    {updated, _} =  
  302: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,"INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++ 
  303: 			       "'" ++ string:chars($a, 
  304: 						   ?RDBMS:fixed_char_max())
  305: 			       ++ "')"),
  306: 	    %% Select data
  307: 	    {selected, Fields, [{CharStr}]} =
  308: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table),
  309: 	    true = length(CharStr) == ?RDBMS:fixed_char_max(),
  310: 	    
  311: 	    ["FIELD"] = odbc_test_lib:to_upper(Fields),
  312: 	    
  313: 	    %% Too long data
  314: 	    {error, _} =  
  315: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++  
  316: 			       "'" ++ string:chars($a, 
  317: 						   (?RDBMS:fixed_char_max()
  318: 						    + 1)) 
  319: 			       ++ "')"),		
  320: 	    %% Clean up
  321: 	    {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
  322: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref, "DROP TABLE " ++ Table),
  323: 	    
  324: 	    %% Above limit 
  325: 	    {error, _} =
  326: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++  
  327: 			       ?RDBMS:create_fixed_char_table(
  328: 				  (?RDBMS:fixed_char_max() + 1)))
  329:     end.
  330: 
  331: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  332: 
  333: char_fixed_padding() ->
  334:     [{doc, "Tests that data that is shorter than the given size is padded " 
  335:      "with blanks."}].
  336: char_fixed_padding(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  337:     Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),   
  338:     Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
  339: 
  340:     %% Data should be padded with blanks
  341:     {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
  342: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
  343: 			   ?RDBMS:create_fixed_char_table(
  344: 			      ?RDBMS:fixed_char_max())),
  345: 
  346:     {updated, _} =
  347: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++ 
  348: 			   "'" ++ string:chars($a,
  349: 					       ?RDBMS:fixed_char_min())
  350: 		       ++ "')"),
  351: 
  352:     {selected, Fields, [{CharStr}]} =
  353: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table),
  354:     true = length(CharStr) == ?RDBMS:fixed_char_max(),
  355: 	    ["FIELD"] = odbc_test_lib:to_upper(Fields).
  356: 
  357: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  358: 
  359: varchar_lower_limit() ->
  360:     [{doc,"Tests variable length char data type lower boundaries."}].
  361: varchar_lower_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  362:     Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),   
  363:     Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
  364: 
  365:     %% Below limit
  366:     {error, _} = 
  367: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++
  368: 			   ?RDBMS:create_var_char_table(
  369: 			      ?RDBMS:var_char_min() - 1)),
  370:     %% Lower limit
  371:     {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
  372: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
  373: 				   ?RDBMS:create_var_char_table(
  374: 				      ?RDBMS:var_char_min())),
  375: 
  376:     Str = string:chars($a, ?RDBMS:var_char_min()),
  377: 
  378:     %% Right length data
  379:     {updated, _} =  
  380: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++ 
  381: 			   "'" ++ Str ++ "')"),
  382:     %% Select data
  383:     {selected, Fields, [{Str}]} =
  384: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table),
  385:     
  386:     ["FIELD"] = odbc_test_lib:to_upper(Fields),
  387: 
  388:     %% Too long datae
  389:     {error, _} =
  390: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++
  391: 				   "'" ++ string:chars($a,
  392: 						       (?RDBMS:var_char_min()+1))
  393: 			       ++ "')").
  394: 
  395: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  396: 
  397: varchar_upper_limit() ->
  398:     [{doc,"Tests variable length char data type upper boundaries."}].
  399: varchar_upper_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  400:     Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),   
  401:     Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
  402: 
  403:     case ?RDBMS of
  404: 	oracle ->
  405: 	    {skip, "Known bug in database"};
  406: 	postgres ->
  407: 	    {skip, "Limit unknown"};
  408: 	_ ->
  409: 	    %% Upper limit 
  410: 	    {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
  411: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
  412: 			       ?RDBMS:create_var_char_table(
  413: 				  ?RDBMS:var_char_max())), 
  414: 	    {updated, _} =  
  415: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++ 
  416: 			       "'" ++ string:chars($a, 
  417: 						   ?RDBMS:var_char_max())
  418: 			       ++ "')"),
  419: 	    
  420: 	    {selected, Fields, [{CharStr}]} =
  421: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table),
  422: 	    true = length(CharStr) == ?RDBMS:var_char_max(),
  423: 	    
  424: 	    ["FIELD"] = odbc_test_lib:to_upper(Fields),
  425: 	    
  426: 	    %% Too long data
  427: 	    {error, _} =  
  428: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++ 
  429: 			       "'" ++ string:chars($a, 
  430: 						   (?RDBMS:var_char_max()+1)) 
  431: 		       ++ "')"),
  432: 	    %% Clean up
  433: 	    {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
  434: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref, "DROP TABLE " ++ Table), 
  435: 	    
  436: 	    %% Above limit 
  437: 	    {error, _} =
  438: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
  439: 			       ?RDBMS:create_var_char_table(
  440: 				  (?RDBMS:var_char_max() + 1))),
  441: 	    ok
  442:     end.
  443: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  444: 
  445: varchar_no_padding() ->
  446:     [{doc, "Tests that data that is shorter than the given max size is not padded " 
  447:      "with blanks."}].
  448: varchar_no_padding(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  449:     Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),   
  450:     Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
  451: 
  452:     %% Data should NOT be padded with blanks
  453:     {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
  454: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
  455: 		       ?RDBMS:create_var_char_table(
  456: 			  ?RDBMS:var_char_max())), 
  457:     {updated, _} =  
  458: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++ 
  459: 		       "'" ++ string:chars($a, ?RDBMS:var_char_min())
  460: 		       ++ "')"),
  461: 
  462:     {selected, Fields, [{CharStr}]} =
  463: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table),
  464:     true = length(CharStr) /= ?RDBMS:var_char_max(),
  465:     ["FIELD"] = odbc_test_lib:to_upper(Fields).
  466: 
  467: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  468: 
  469: text_lower_limit() ->
  470:     [{doc,"Tests 'long' char data type lower boundaries."}].
  471: text_lower_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  472:     Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),   
  473:     Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
  474: 
  475:     {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
  476: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
  477: 		       ?RDBMS:create_text_table()), 
  478: 
  479:     {updated, _} =  
  480: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++ 
  481: 		       "'" ++ string:chars($a, ?RDBMS:text_min())
  482: 		       ++ "')"),
  483: 
  484:     {selected, Fields, [{"a"}]} =
  485: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table),
  486:     ["FIELD"] = odbc_test_lib:to_upper(Fields).
  487: 
  488: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  489: 
  490: text_upper_limit() ->
  491:     [{doc,"Tests 'text' char data type upper boundaries."}].
  492: text_upper_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  493:     
  494:     {skip,"Consumes too much resources" }.
  495: %%     Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),
  496: %%     Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
  497: 
  498: %%     {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
  499: %% 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
  500: %% 		       ?RDBMS:create_text_table()), 
  501: %%     {updated, _} =  
  502: %% 	odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++ 
  503: %% 		       "'" ++ string:chars($a, ?RDBMS:text_max())
  504: %% 		       ++ "')"),
  505: 
  506: %%     {selected, Fields, [{CharStr}]} =
  507: %% 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table),
  508: %%     length(CharStr) == ?RDBMS:text_max(),
  509: %%     ["FIELD"] = odbc_test_lib:to_upper(Fields),
  510:     
  511: %%     {error, _} =  
  512: %% 	odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++ 
  513: %% 		       "'" ++ string:chars($a, (?RDBMS:text_max()+1)) 
  514: %% 		       ++ "')").
  515: 
  516: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  517: 
  518: binary_char_fixed_lower_limit() ->
  519:     [{doc,"Tests fixed length char data type lower boundaries."}].
  520: binary_char_fixed_lower_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  521:     Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),   
  522:     Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
  523: 
  524:     %% Below limit
  525:     {error, _} = 
  526: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref, 
  527: 		       "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++    
  528: 		       ?RDBMS:create_fixed_char_table(
  529: 			  (?RDBMS:fixed_char_min() - 1))), 
  530:     %% Lower limit
  531:     {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
  532: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
  533: 		       ?RDBMS:create_fixed_char_table(
  534: 			  ?RDBMS:fixed_char_min())), 
  535: 
  536:     Str = string:chars($a, ?RDBMS:fixed_char_min()),
  537: 
  538:     %% Right length data
  539:     {updated, _} =  
  540: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++
  541: 		       "'" ++ Str
  542: 		       ++ "')"),
  543: 
  544:     Bin = list_to_binary(Str),
  545: 
  546:     %% Select data
  547:     {selected, Fields,[{Bin}]} =
  548: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table),
  549: 
  550:     ["FIELD"] = odbc_test_lib:to_upper(Fields),
  551: 
  552:     %% Too long data
  553:     {error, _}  =  
  554: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,"INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++
  555: 		       "'" ++ string:chars($a, 
  556: 					   (?RDBMS:fixed_char_min()
  557: 					    + 1)) 
  558: 		       ++ "')").
  559: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  560: 
  561: binary_char_fixed_upper_limit() ->
  562:     [{doc,"Tests fixed length char data type upper boundaries."}].
  563: binary_char_fixed_upper_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  564: 
  565:     case ?RDBMS of
  566: 	postgres ->
  567: 	    {skip, "Limit unknown"};
  568: 	_ ->
  569: 	    Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),   
  570: 	    Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
  571: 	    
  572: 	    %% Upper limit 
  573: 	    {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
  574: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
  575: 			       ?RDBMS:create_fixed_char_table(
  576: 				  ?RDBMS:fixed_char_max())), 
  577: 	    {updated, _} =  
  578: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,"INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++ 
  579: 			       "'" ++ string:chars($a, 
  580: 						   ?RDBMS:fixed_char_max())
  581: 			       ++ "')"),
  582: 	    %% Select data
  583: 	    {selected, Fields, [{CharBin}]} =
  584: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table),
  585: 	    true = size(CharBin) == ?RDBMS:fixed_char_max(),
  586: 	    
  587: 	    ["FIELD"] = odbc_test_lib:to_upper(Fields),
  588: 	    
  589: 	    %% Too long data
  590: 	    {error, _} =  
  591: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++  
  592: 			       "'" ++ string:chars($a, 
  593: 						   (?RDBMS:fixed_char_max()
  594: 						    + 1)) 
  595: 			       ++ "')"),		
  596: 	    %% Clean up
  597: 	    {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
  598: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref, "DROP TABLE " ++ Table),
  599: 	    
  600: 	    %% Above limit 
  601: 	    {error, _} =
  602: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++  
  603: 			       ?RDBMS:create_fixed_char_table(
  604: 				  (?RDBMS:fixed_char_max() + 1))), 
  605: 	    ok
  606:     end.
  607: 
  608: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  609: 
  610: binary_char_fixed_padding() ->
  611:     [{doc, "Tests that data that is shorter than the given size is padded " 
  612:      "with blanks."}].
  613: binary_char_fixed_padding(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  614:     Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),   
  615:     Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
  616: 
  617:     %% Data should be padded with blanks
  618:     {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
  619: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
  620: 		       ?RDBMS:create_fixed_char_table(
  621: 			  ?RDBMS:fixed_char_max())), 
  622: 
  623:     {updated, _} =  
  624: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++ 
  625: 		       "'" ++ string:chars($a, 
  626: 					   ?RDBMS:fixed_char_min())
  627: 		       ++ "')"),
  628: 
  629:     {selected, Fields, [{CharBin}]} =
  630: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table),
  631:     true = size(CharBin) == ?RDBMS:fixed_char_max(),
  632:     ["FIELD"] = odbc_test_lib:to_upper(Fields).
  633: 
  634: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  635: 
  636: binary_varchar_lower_limit() ->
  637:     [{doc,"Tests variable length char data type lower boundaries."}].
  638: binary_varchar_lower_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  639:     Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),   
  640:     Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
  641: 
  642:     %% Below limit
  643:     {error, _} = 
  644: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
  645: 		       ?RDBMS:create_var_char_table(
  646: 			  ?RDBMS:var_char_min() - 1)), 
  647:     %% Lower limit
  648:     {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
  649: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
  650: 		       ?RDBMS:create_var_char_table(
  651: 			  ?RDBMS:var_char_min())), 
  652: 
  653:     Str = string:chars($a, ?RDBMS:var_char_min()),
  654: 
  655:     %% Right length data
  656:     {updated, _} =  
  657: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++ 
  658: 		       "'" ++ Str
  659: 		       ++ "')"),
  660:     BinStr = list_to_binary(Str),
  661: 
  662:     %% Select data
  663:     {selected, Fields, [{BinStr}]} =
  664: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table),
  665:     
  666:     ["FIELD"] = odbc_test_lib:to_upper(Fields),
  667: 
  668:     %% Too long data
  669:     {error, _} =  
  670: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++ 
  671: 		       "'" ++ string:chars($a, 
  672: 					   (?RDBMS:var_char_min()+1)) 
  673: 		       ++ "')").
  674: 
  675: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  676: 
  677: binary_varchar_upper_limit() ->
  678:     [{doc,"Tests variable length char data type upper boundaries."}].
  679: binary_varchar_upper_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  680:     Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),   
  681:     Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
  682: 
  683:     case ?RDBMS of
  684: 	oracle ->
  685: 	    {skip, "Known bug in database"};
  686: 	postgres ->
  687: 	    {skip, "Limit unknown"};
  688: 	_ ->
  689: 	    %% Upper limit 
  690: 	    {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
  691: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
  692: 			       ?RDBMS:create_var_char_table(
  693: 				  ?RDBMS:var_char_max())), 
  694: 	    {updated, _} =  
  695: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++ 
  696: 			       "'" ++ string:chars($a, 
  697: 						   ?RDBMS:var_char_max())
  698: 			       ++ "')"),
  699: 	    
  700: 	    {selected, Fields, [{CharBin}]} =
  701: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table),
  702: 	    true = size(CharBin) == ?RDBMS:var_char_max(),
  703: 	    
  704: 	    ["FIELD"] = odbc_test_lib:to_upper(Fields),
  705: 	    
  706: 	    %% Too long data
  707: 	    {error, _} =  
  708: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++ 
  709: 			       "'" ++ string:chars($a, 
  710: 						   (?RDBMS:var_char_max()+1)) 
  711: 		       ++ "')"),
  712: 	    %% Clean up
  713: 	    {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
  714: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref, "DROP TABLE " ++ Table), 
  715: 	    
  716: 	    %% Above limit 
  717: 	    {error, _} =
  718: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
  719: 			       ?RDBMS:create_var_char_table(
  720: 				  (?RDBMS:var_char_max() + 1)))
  721:     end.
  722: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  723: 
  724: binary_varchar_no_padding() ->
  725:     [{doc,"Tests that data that is shorter than the given max size is not padded " 
  726:      "with blanks."}].
  727: binary_varchar_no_padding(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  728:     Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),   
  729:     Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
  730: 
  731:     %% Data should NOT be padded with blanks
  732:     {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
  733: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
  734: 		       ?RDBMS:create_var_char_table(
  735: 			  ?RDBMS:var_char_max())), 
  736:     {updated, _} =  
  737: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++ 
  738: 		       "'" ++ string:chars($a, ?RDBMS:var_char_min())
  739: 		       ++ "')"),
  740: 
  741:     {selected, Fields, [{CharBin}]} =
  742: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table),
  743:     true = size(CharBin) /= ?RDBMS:var_char_max(),
  744:     ["FIELD"] = odbc_test_lib:to_upper(Fields).
  745: 
  746: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------

  798: tiny_int_lower_limit() ->
  799:     [{doc,"Tests integer of type tinyint."}].
  800: tiny_int_lower_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  801:     case ?RDBMS of
  802: 	postgres ->
  803: 	    {skip, "Type tiniyint not supported"};
  804: 	_ ->
  805: 	    Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),   
  806: 	    Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
  807: 	    
  808: 	    {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
  809: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
  810: 			       ?RDBMS:create_tiny_int_table()), 
  811: 	    
  812: 	    {updated, _} =  
  813: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++ 
  814: 			       "'" ++ integer_to_list(?RDBMS:tiny_int_min())
  815: 			       ++ "')"),
  816: 	    
  817: 	    SelectResult =  ?RDBMS:tiny_int_min_selected(),
  818: 	    SelectResult =
  819: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table),
  820: 	    
  821: 	    {error, _} =  
  822: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++ 
  823: 			       "'" ++ integer_to_list(?RDBMS:tiny_int_min() 
  824: 						      - 1)
  825: 			       ++ "')")
  826:     end.
  827:

 1020: bit_false(Config) when is_list(Config) ->  
 1021:     case ?RDBMS of
 1022: 	oracle ->
 1023: 	    {skip, "Not supported by driver"};
 1024: 	_ ->
 1025: 	    Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),   
 1026: 	    Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
 1027: 	    
 1028: 	    {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
 1029: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
 1030: 			       ?RDBMS:create_bit_table()), 
 1031: 	    
 1032: 	    {updated, _} =  
 1033: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++
 1034: 			       " VALUES(" ++ 	
 1035: 			       "'" ++ integer_to_list(?RDBMS:bit_false())
 1036: 			       ++ "')"),
 1037: 	    
 1038: 	    SelectResult = ?RDBMS:bit_false_selected(),
 1039: 	    SelectResult =
 1040: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table),
 1041: 	    
 1042: 	    {error, _} =  
 1043: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++ 
 1044: 			       "'" ++ integer_to_list(-1)
 1045: 			       ++ "')")
 1046:     end.
 1047: 
 1048: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1049: 
 1050: bit_true(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1051:     case ?RDBMS of
 1052: 	oracle ->
 1053: 	    {skip, "Not supported by driver"};
 1054: 	_ ->
 1055: 	    Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),   
 1056: 	    Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
 1057: 	    
 1058: 	    
 1059: 	    {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
 1060: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
 1061: 			       ?RDBMS:create_bit_table()), 
 1062: 	    
 1063: 	    {updated, _} =  
 1064: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref, 
 1065: 			       "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++ 
 1066: 			       "'" ++ integer_to_list(?RDBMS:bit_true())
 1067: 			       ++ "')"),
 1068: 	    
 1069: 	    SelectResult =  ?RDBMS:bit_true_selected(),
 1070: 	    SelectResult =
 1071: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table),
 1072: 	    
 1073: 	    {error, _} =  
 1074: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++ 
 1075: 			       "'" ++ integer_to_list(-1)
 1076: 			       ++ "')")
 1077:     end.
 1078: 
 1079: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1080: 
 1081: float_lower_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->   
 1082: 
 1083:     Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),   
 1084:     Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
 1085: 
 1086:     case ?RDBMS of
 1087: 	mysql ->
 1088: 	    {skip, "Not clearly defined in MYSQL"};
 1089: 	_ ->
 1090: 	    {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
 1091: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
 1092: 				   ?RDBMS:create_float_table()),
 1093: 
 1094: 	    {updated, _} =  
 1095: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++ 
 1096: 				   "'" ++ float_to_list(
 1097: 					    ?RDBMS:float_min())
 1098: 			       ++ "')"),
 1099: 	    {selected,[_ColName],[{MinFloat}]} =
 1100: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table),
 1101: 
 1102: 	    true = ?RDBMS:float_min() == MinFloat,
 1103: 
 1104: 	    case ?RDBMS of
 1105: 		oracle ->
 1106: 		    {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
 1107: 			odbc:sql_query(Ref, "DROP TABLE " ++ Table),
 1108: 
 1109: 		    {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
 1110: 			odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++
 1111: 					   ?RDBMS:create_float_table()),
 1112: 		    {updated, _} =
 1113: 			odbc:sql_query(Ref,
 1114: 				       "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++
 1115: 				       ?RDBMS:float_underflow() ++ ")"),
 1116: 		    SelectResult = ?RDBMS:float_zero_selected(),
 1117: 		    SelectResult =
 1118: 			odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table);
 1119: 		_ ->
 1120: 		    {error, _} =
 1121: 			odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++
 1122: 					   ?RDBMS:float_underflow() ++ ")")
 1123: 	    end
 1124:     end.
 1125: 
 1126: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1127: 
 1128: float_upper_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->   
 1129:     Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),   
 1130:     Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
 1131: 
 1132:     case ?RDBMS of
 1133: 	mysql ->
 1134: 	    {skip, "Not clearly defined in MYSQL"};
 1135: 	_->
 1136: 	    {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
 1137: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++
 1138: 				   ?RDBMS:create_float_table()),
 1139: 
 1140: 	    {updated, _} =
 1141: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++
 1142: 				   "'" ++ float_to_list(
 1143: 					    ?RDBMS:float_max())
 1144: 			       ++ "')"),
 1145: 	    {selected,[_ColName],[{MaxFloat}]}
 1146: 		= odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table),
 1147: 
 1148: 	    true = ?RDBMS:float_max() == MaxFloat,
 1149: 
 1150: 	    {error, _} =
 1151: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(" ++
 1152: 				   ?RDBMS:float_overflow() ++ ")")
 1153:     end.
 1154: 
 1155: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------

 1157:     [{doc,"Test the float value zero."}].

 1159:     Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),   
 1160:     Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
 1161: 
 1162:     {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
 1163: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
 1164: 		       ?RDBMS:create_float_table()), 
 1165: 
 1166:     {updated, _} =  
 1167: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES('0')"),
 1168: 
 1169:     SelectResult = ?RDBMS:float_zero_selected(),
 1170:     SelectResult =
 1171: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table).
 1172: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------

 1174:     [{doc,"Test the real value zero."}].

 1176:     Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),   
 1177:     Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
 1178: 
 1179:     case ?RDBMS of
 1180: 	oracle ->
 1181: 	    {skip, "Not supported in Oracle"};  
 1182:         _ ->	    
 1183: 	    {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
 1184: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
 1185: 			       ?RDBMS:create_real_table()), 
 1186: 
 1187: 	    {updated, _} =  
 1188: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++
 1189: 			       " VALUES('0')"),
 1190: 
 1191: 	    SelectResult = ?RDBMS:real_zero_selected(),
 1192: 	    SelectResult =
 1193: 		odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table)
 1194:     end.

 1213: dec_double(suit) ->
 1214:     [];
 1215: dec_double(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1216:     Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),   
 1217:     Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
 1218: 
 1219:     {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
 1220: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
 1221: 		       "(FIELD DECIMAL (10,0))"), 
 1222:     {updated, _} =  
 1223: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(1.6)"),
 1224: 
 1225:     {selected, Fields, [{2.00000}]} =
 1226: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table),
 1227:     ["FIELD"] = odbc_test_lib:to_upper(Fields),
 1228: 
 1229:     %% Clean up
 1230:     {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
 1231: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref, "DROP TABLE " ++ Table), 
 1232: 
 1233:     {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
 1234: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
 1235: 		       "(FIELD DECIMAL (15,0))"), 
 1236:     {updated, _} =  
 1237: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(1.6)"),
 1238: 
 1239:     {selected, Fields1, [{2.00000}]} =		
 1240: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table),
 1241:      ["FIELD"] = odbc_test_lib:to_upper(Fields1),
 1242: 
 1243:     %% Clean up
 1244:     {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
 1245: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref, "DROP TABLE " ++ Table), 
 1246: 
 1247: 
 1248:     {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
 1249: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
 1250: 		       "(FIELD DECIMAL (15, 1))"), 
 1251:     {updated, _} =  
 1252: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++" VALUES(1.6)"),
 1253: 
 1254:     {selected, Fields2, [{1.60000}]} =
 1255: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT FIELD FROM " ++ Table),
 1256:     ["FIELD"] = odbc_test_lib:to_upper(Fields2).

 1380: %%------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1381: utf8() ->
 1382:     [{doc,"Test unicode support"}].
 1383: utf8(suit) ->
 1384:     [];
 1385: utf8(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1386:     Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),   
 1387:     Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
 1388:     
 1389:     odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ "(FIELD text)"),
 1390: 
 1391:     Latin1Data = ["ÖÄÅÄÖÅäöå",
 1392:                   "testasdf",
 1393:                   "Row 3",
 1394:                   "Row 4",
 1395:                   "Row 5",
 1396:                   "Row 6",
 1397:                   "Row 7",
 1398:                   "Row 8",
 1399:                   "Row 9",
 1400:                   "Row 10",
 1401:                   "Row 11",
 1402:                   "Row 12"],
 1403:     
 1404:     UnicodeIn = lists:map(fun(String) ->
 1405: 				  unicode:characters_to_binary(String,latin1,utf8)
 1406: 			  end,
 1407: 			  Latin1Data),
 1408:     
 1409:     ct:pal("UnicodeIn: ~p ~n",[UnicodeIn]),
 1410:     {updated, _} = odbc:param_query(Ref,"INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++ "(FIELD) values(?)",
 1411: 				    [{{sql_varchar,50}, UnicodeIn}]),
 1412:     
 1413:     {selected,_,UnicodeOut} = odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT * FROM " ++ Table),
 1414: 
 1415:     ct:pal("UnicodeOut: ~p~n", [UnicodeOut]),
 1416:      
 1417:     Result = lists:map(fun({Char}) ->
 1418: 			       unicode:characters_to_list(Char,utf8)
 1419: 		       end, UnicodeOut),
 1420: 
 1421:     ct:pal("Result: ~p ~n", [Result]),
 1422:     
 1423:     Latin1Data = Result.
 1424: %%------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1425: 
 1426: nchar() ->
 1427:     [{doc,"Test unicode nchar support in sqlserver"}].

 1436: 			   "(FIELD nchar(50))"),
 1437: 
 1438:     w_char_support(Ref, Table, sql_wvarchar, 50).
 1439:

 1456: %%------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1457: timestamp(suit) ->
 1458:     [];
 1459: timestamp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1460:     Ref = proplists:get_value(connection_ref, Config),   
 1461:     Table = proplists:get_value(tableName, Config),
 1462: 
 1463:     {updated, _} =  % Value == 0 || -1 driver dependent!
 1464: 	odbc:sql_query(Ref,  "CREATE TABLE " ++ Table ++ 
 1465: 		       ?RDBMS:create_timestamp_table()),
 1466: 
 1467:     Data = [calendar:local_time(),
 1468: 	    {{2009,6,17},{20,54,59}},
 1469: 	    {{2009,6,18},{20,54,59}},
 1470: 	    {{2009,6,19},{20,54,59}},
 1471: 	    {{2009,6,20},{20,54,59}},
 1472: 	    {{2009,6,21},{20,54,59}}],
 1473:     
 1474:     {updated, _} = odbc:param_query(Ref,"INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++  "(FIELD) values(?)",
 1475: 				    [{sql_timestamp,Data}]),
 1476:     
 1477:     %%% Create list or database table rows 
 1478:     TimeStamps = lists:map(fun(Value) -> {Value} end, Data),
 1479:    
 1480:     {selected,_, TimeStamps} = odbc:sql_query(Ref, "SELECT * FROM " ++ Table).
 1481: %%------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1482: 
 1483: w_char_support(Ref, Table, CharType, Size) ->
 1484:     Latin1Data = ["ÖÄÅÄÖÅäöå",
 1485:                   "testasdf",
 1486:                   "Row 3",
 1487:                   "Row 4",
 1488:                   "Row 5",
 1489:                   "Row 6",
 1490:                   "Row 7",
 1491:                   "Row 8",
 1492:                   "Row 9",
 1493:                   "Row 10",
 1494:                   "Row 11",
 1495:                   "Row 12"],
 1496: 
 1497:     UnicodeIn = lists:map(fun(S) ->
 1498:                                   unicode:characters_to_binary(S,latin1,{utf16,little})
 1499:                           end,
 1500:                           Latin1Data),
 1501: 
 1502:     ct:pal("UnicodeIn (utf 16): ~p ~n",[UnicodeIn]),
 1503: 
 1504:     {updated, _} = odbc:param_query(Ref, "INSERT INTO " ++ Table ++ "(FIELD) values(?)",
 1505: 				    [{{CharType, Size},UnicodeIn}]),
 1506: 
 1507:     {selected,_,UnicodeOut} = odbc:sql_query(Ref,"SELECT * FROM " ++ Table),
 1508: 
 1509:     ct:pal("UnicodeOut: ~p~n", [UnicodeOut]),
 1510: 
 1511:     PadResult = lists:map(fun({Unicode}) ->
 1512: 			       unicode:characters_to_list(Unicode,{utf16,little})
 1513: 		       end,
 1514: 		       UnicodeOut),
 1515: 
 1516:     ct:pal("Result: ~p~n", [PadResult]),
 1517: 
 1518:     Result = lists:map(fun(Str) -> string:strip(Str) end, PadResult),
 1519: 
 1520:     Latin1Data = Result.
